meanings.sent1: She always prechecks her homework before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: He prechecks the weather forecast before planning a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The detective prechecks the crime scene for any clues.
meanings.sent4: Before the journey, the hiker prechecks all the necessary supplies in his backpack.
meanings.sent5: The chef prechecks the ingredients to ensure a successful recipe.

meanings.sent1: The mechanic performed prechecks on the car before starting the repairs.
meanings.sent2: The security guard conducts prechecks on all visitors entering the building.
meanings.sent3: The prechecks at the airport helped streamline the boarding process.
meanings.sent4: The prechecks on the equipment revealed a potential issue that was quickly resolved.
meanings.sent5: The prechecks on the documents saved time during the audit.
